original_text: Then you shall cut the ram into pieces, and wash its entrails and its legs, and put them with its pieces and its head,
korean_text: 그 숫양의 각을 뜨고 그 장부와 다리는 씻어 각을 뜬 고기와 그 머리와 함께 두고

sentences.original_text: Then you shall cut the ram into pieces
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너는 그 수양을 토막 내고

sentences.original_text: and wash its entrails and its legs
and put them with its pieces and its head
sentences.korean_translation: 그것들을 그 토막과 그 머리와 함께 두라
